job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: As a front engineer in the team, you will work with customers, product managers, and SRE experts to define observability product features and drive their requirements and implementation.Basic Qualifications:3+ years of relevant work experienceProficiency in TypeScript, Javascript, CSS, HTML, and React.jsExcellent programming skills - developing, debugging, testing and optimizing code.Passionate about building elegant and powerful user interfaces to solve customer problems.Experience driving technical designs for frontend systems.Comfortable making usable design and layout decisions independentlyStrong communication skills, both verbal and written.Extensive knowledge of web standards and modern browsers and of the full web technology stack.Comfortable with technical ownership, managing multiple stakeholders, and working as part of a global teamStrong knowledge of SDLC build tools, automated testing, and SPA packaging (Gitlab, NPM, Yarn, Jest, Webpack)Preferred Qualifications:Experience building UIs for data-rich analytical applications for technical usersExperience with front-end state management systems, such as react-query or ReduxExperience modifying open source software products, collaborating and upstreaming changesExperience with mainstream web transports an standards such as REST, WebSockets, and OAuthExperience with back-end API development using GoStrong interpersonal skills, drive, and ownership.
